name: Crystal Experiment
description:
A scientist is working late and alone in his laboratory on a project. Suddenly a problem occurs in one of the machines and the experiment explodes causing unexpected things.

The player finds himself inside the experiment he was working on. Not fully understanding how it all happened, he has to find a way out.

Main gameplay is based around finding and solving chemistry puzzles where all the narrative is based on, with some science-fiction around some monsters and events.

In this first-playable the player only need to pick up the objects/Elements scattered around the level and bring them to the center where the number of elements raise and where the player needs to jump into to finish the game.
